review: Would get five stars,  I don't like how you turn the system off.  Should be something on the remote.  Instead you have to go to Settings then to Systems then click on Sleep.  Also it has frozen once since i have set it up on Christmas. Disconnect the power input to reset.  Also for some reason the remote wouldn't work. Tried new batteries still didn't work. Then after a bit it just started working.  Like I said needs some improvements Its a lot better than going through my PS3 to watch Netflix and Hulu.
author: Steve R Holden

review: Easy installation.  I'm still getting used to having to switch between HDM1 and 2.  I watched a few series that I had not heard of before but they only have Season 1 Episode 1 - so that was disappointing.  Any clue when they will be available>  (Bosch & The Awakened).  But all in all, I think we're going to get a lot of enjoyment out of it.
